sql-select.name: GetEmptyTables
Empty Tables
sql-select.description: Find all tables without any rows.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysindexes] tSI ON tSI.[id] = tSO.[id] WHERE tSO.[xtype] IN ( N'U' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSI.[indid] IN (0, 1) AND ( tSI.[name] NOT LIKE 'sys%' OR tSI.[name] IS NULL ) AND tSI.[rowcnt] = 0 GROUP BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSO.[crdate] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[partitions] tSP ON tSP.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[allocation_units] tSAU ON tSAU.[container_id] = tSP.[partition_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] IN ( N'USER_TABLE' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 GROUP BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] HAVING SUM( CASE WHEN (tSP.[index_id] IN (0, 1)) AND (tSAU.[type] = 1) THEN tSP.[rows] ELSE 0 END ) = 0 ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
